title: WTT: My T205 Needham for your Sovereign T205/T206

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Needham for your Sovereign T205/T206
posts.post_content:
Anybody want to trade?  I picked up an extra Needham in another trade.  I'm always looking to trade for your Sovereigns!

Take Care,
Geno
